definitions.definition: A broad-spectrum aminoglycoside antibiotic mixture, derived from an actinomycete ( Micromonospora echinospora ), extensively used as the sulfate in treating severe systemic bacterial infections (as of the urinary tract ); (3 R ,4 R ,5 R )-2-{[(1 S ,2 S ,3 R ,4 S ,6 R )-4,6- diamino -3-{[(2 R ,3 R ,6 S )-3- amino- 6-[(1 R )-1-( methylamino ) ethyl ] oxan -2 -yl ] oxy }-2- hydroxy cyclohexyl ]oxy}-5- methyl- 4-(methylamino) oxane -3,5- diol .

main_definition: ( biochemistry , pharmacology ) A broad-spectrum aminoglycoside antibiotic mixture, derived from an actinomycete ( Micromonospora echinospora ), extensively used as the sulfate in treating severe systemic bacterial infections (as of the urinary tract ); (3 R ,4 R ,5 R )-2-{[(1 S ,2 S ,3 R ,4 S ,6 R )-4,6- diamino -3-{[(2 R ,3 R ,6 S )-3- amino- 6-[(1 R )-1-( methylamino ) ethyl ] oxan -2 -yl ] oxy }-2- hydroxy cyclohexyl ]oxy}-5- methyl- 4-(methylamino) oxane -3,5- diol .
